title: Unspoken (Hey Pretty Prequel): A Sal Raniero Thriller
description: She always ran to me.Until he showed up.For years, I sheltered her under my wing.For years, I kept her safe.For years, I loved her without bounds.But my best friend, he stole my little lamb.Yet, I'm the one sitting in a cell now.Not the unkind son of a bitch thief.Not long, Pretty. Not long.Unspoken is a prequel novella to the upcoming Sal Raniero novel, “Hey Pretty.” Unspoken follows the She/He - A Duet but is standalone.
author: Kailee Reese Samuels
